text:
This studio was beautiful--clean, minimal and located just a hop, skip and jump east of downtown. Andrea and Roman were great communicators and hosts--very responsive over text messaging.  I was visiting Austin on business and working long days, and it was a pleasure to spend the night in this space.

The bed is located in a loft. This is a really fun experience, but not for everyone.
title: Private Studio in Modern Crash Pad
